hero.subtitle: An AI-powered application to create, refine, and manage detailed prompts for text-to-video models like Sora. Describe your vision, select cinematic parameters, and let the AI craft the perfect prompt.

outputPlaceholder.title: Your Prompt Awaits
outputPlaceholder.subtitle: Fill out the form and click 'Generate' to see the AI-crafted prompt appear here.

promptForm.title: üé¨ Composition Panel
promptForm.subtitle: Build your video prompt shot by shot for ultimate creative control.
promptForm.remixingMessage: Remixing a scene. Adjust the settings below or click "Start New".
promptForm.importedMessage: Editing an imported prompt. Adjust the deconstructed settings below to refine and regenerate.
promptForm.sceneDescriptionLabel: Overall Scene Description (Core idea, environment, mood)
promptForm.sceneDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A cyberpunk city alley, drenched in neon rain, where a lone detective finds a mysterious glowing artifact.
promptForm.cameosPlaceholder: e.g., A grizzled cyborg, a hologram geisha
promptForm.cameoConsentLabel: I have consent to use the likeness of any real people.
promptForm.cameoConsentDescription: You must have permission before using the names or likenesses of real individuals.

import.tooltip: Import an existing prompt to deconstruct and improve it
import.modalSubtitle: Paste your existing prompt below. The AI will analyze it and break it down into the structured editor.
import.placeholder: Paste your full Sora prompt here...
import.errorMessage: Failed to deconstruct prompt. The AI could not understand the text or a network error occurred.

guidelines.title: Creative Guidelines
guidelines.one: Avoid requesting violent, hateful, or explicit content.
guidelines.two: Do not use copyrighted music or audio in your sound descriptions.
guidelines.three: Ensure all generated content is clearly marked as AI-created when shared.

error.descriptionNeeded: Please enter a scene description first.
error.suggestionsFailed: Could not fetch suggestions. Please try again.
error.cameoConsentNeeded: Please confirm cameo consent before generating

shotEditor.title: üé¨ Shot #{{index}}
shotEditor.descriptionPlaceholder: Action, details, physical interactions (e.g., water splashing, heavy object impact)...
shotEditor.constraintsPlaceholder: Constraints / Negative prompt (e.g., no people, avoid fast cuts, natural lighting only)...

advancedSettings.title: üî¨ Advanced Physics & Audio
advancedSettings.weightAndRigidityPlaceholder: e.g., Objects have significant weight; fabrics are stiff.
advancedSettings.materialInteractionsPlaceholder: e.g., Heavy raindrops splash realistically; glass shatters into fine pieces.
advancedSettings.environmentalForcesPlaceholder: e.g., Low gravity; strong winds affect character movement.
advancedSettings.dialoguePlaceholder: e.g., A character whispers, 'I've been waiting...'
advancedSettings.sfxPlaceholder: e.g., Sizzling rain, distant sirens, the crackle of a neon sign.
advancedSettings.musicPlaceholder: e.g., A low, tense synthesizer score swells; music cuts out on impact.

cameraEffects.title: üé• Scene-Wide Camera Effects
cameraEffects.description: Set default camera behaviors for all shots. These can be overridden in individual shot parameters.

generatedPrompt.title: ‚ú® Generated Prompt
generatedPrompt.versionNotesPlaceholder: e.g., v2: Changed lens to 85mm, added rain.
generatedPrompt.saveDisabledTooltip: Generate a new prompt to save

gallery.title: üñºÔ∏è Scene Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Review, remix, and manage your saved creations.

empty.title: üì≠ Your Gallery is Empty
empty.subtitle: Generate and save scenes to see them here.
